org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.extensions

Interface Frame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryFrame, CloseFrame, ContinuationFrame, ControlFrame, DataFrame, MuxedFrame, PingFrame, PongFrame, TextFrame, WebSocketFrame

    public interface Frame
    An immutable websocket frame.
